title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
**Description:**

Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger in the striking Yellow/Black color (model number DCK240C2). This combo kit includes everything you need to tackle a wide range of applications with ease.

The Drill/Driver, model DCD771, features a speed transmission with 2 settings for optimal control. It offers a low speed of 0 RPM and a high speed of 1500 RPM. With a power output of 300 UWO (Unit Watts Out), this drill delivers reliable performance. The compact and lightweight design ensures comfortable handling, while the 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck securely holds your bits. The ergonomic handle further enhances comfort and control during use.

The Impact Driver, model DCF885, measures a compact 5.55 inches from front to back. Weighing just 2.8 lbs, it is designed to minimize fatigue during extended use. The 1/4-inch hex chuck allows for easy one-handed bit loading, and it accepts 1-inch bit tips. Equipped with a LED light ring featuring 3 LEDs, it provides superior visibility without casting shadows. The LED light has a delay time of 20 seconds, ensuring you have enough time to see your work area clearly.

This kit includes 2 batteries and a charger, so you can always have a backup battery ready to go. The Lithium Ion batteries offer reliable power and longevity. The charger is included for your convenience.

In addition, this combo kit comes with an LED foot light that provides superior visibility. Whether you're working in dimly lit areas or need extra illumination, this feature has got you covered.

The DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit is perfect for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Don't miss out on this exceptional deal! The package contents include 1x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, 2x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and 1x Charger.

Order now and experience the quality and performance that DEWALT is renowned for!

**Description:**

Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit! This amazing kit includes everything you need to tackle any project with ease. The kit comes with 2 batteries and a charger, so you'll never have to worry about running out of power.

The drill, model DCD771, features a compact and lightweight design that makes it easy to handle. It has a powerful motor with a power output of 300 UWO, providing you with the strength you need to get the job done. The drill also has a 1/2-inch chuck that is a single sleeve ratcheting type, ensuring a secure hold on your bits. The ergonomic handle adds comfort and control to your work.

The impact driver, model DCF885, is also compact and lightweight, measuring just 5.55 inches front to back. It weighs only 2.8 lbs, making it easy to maneuver. The 1/4-inch hex chuck allows for easy one-handed loading of your bits, and it accepts 1-inch bit tips. The impact driver also features a LED light ring with 3 LEDs, providing superior visibility in dark or shadowed areas. The LED light has a delay time of 20 seconds, giving you ample time to see your work.

Both the drill and the impact driver are designed with a yellow and black color scheme, giving them a sleek and professional look. Additionally, the kit includes a LED foot light for even more visibility during your work.

This DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit is perfect for a wide range of applications. Whether you're a professional tradesperson or a DIY enthusiast, this kit has everything you need to get the job done right. The package includes the DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, the DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, 2 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and a Charger.

Upgrade your toolbox with this incredible combo kit today!
